original_text: Yet she became more and more promiscuous as she recalled the days of her youth, when she was a prostitute in Egypt.
korean_text: 그가 그의 음행을 더하여 젊었을 때 곧 애굽 땅에서 행음하던 때를 생각하고

sentences.original_text: Yet she became more and more promiscuous
as she recalled the days of her youth
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 자신의 젊은 시절의 날들을 기억하면서

sentences.original_text: when she was a prostitute in Egypt
